channel.title: Kunal Mishra on
channel.description: Recent content in Kunal Mishra on

item.description: being honest one i think i like a lot about disha is the fact that she’s honest. very honest. we usually dont tell people things that’re bad.
SEO. or Search Engine Optimisation. In 2019, I made my first crappy blog published a few posts. Looking at low traffic, I started finding ways to grow it.
Here’s a running log of everything I did and everything that happened to me in 2022: January I was fine in the morning but by night, I had fever.

item.title: freelancing
item.description: For most of you, freelancing on Fiverr (or any other freelance platform) isn’t worth it. When I got started on Fiverr, I looked around and imitated what others did.

item.title: hire Kunal Mishra
item.description: I’ll probably be up for doing what you want me to if it’s: about something I care for I believe in your idea not boring or managerial work if the people I’ll work along with are amazing Also, if I’ve time (Can’t control this one, I’ve to deal with classes and exams.

item.title: Kunal's Bookshelf
item.description: I’m one of those people who read a lot of book at once. I usually start our many and stop when I don’t feel inspired anymore and then sometimes continue on the ones I stopped.

item.title: Let me know
item.description: If there’s anything I should know, you can just shoot me an email at hey@kunal.tech or DM me on Twitter.

item.title: name-domains
item.description: From quite a few years, I’ve had a fascination for domains that read like proper sentences. At 13-14, I thought of making a platform for people to debate on various topics.

item.title: Notes from Getting Real by Basecamp
item.description: Don’t build a company that follows competitors. If they add 10 features, you don’t need to add 20. Don’t be defensive and paranoid.

item.title: Notes from Range: How Generalists Triumph in a World of Specialists
item.description: Specialise Later. Spend your early days exploring, not exploiting. Experience breeds skills only in kind learning environments. Kind learning environments are like chess.

item.title: notes from Shark Tank India's ðŸ˜¬ moments
item.description: observations I couldn’t resist sharing as I’m watching Shark Tank India 1/ this guy gave away 50% equity for â‚¹40 lacs (~$53k)

item.title: Notes from Stillness is the Key by Ryan Holiday
item.description: Stillness of the Mind Be present and focused. Ruminating about the past or worrying about the future affects your performance the most.

item.title: notes on this site's design
item.description: this site is a work in progress. i’m trying to design it so that it represets who I am. it’s like you’re talking to me.

item.title: Preparing for JEE and BITSAT
item.description: When you start preparing for JEE, there’s an inital period of not being as serious. For me this lasted too long.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I believe in diving my life into areas and projects. Areas are things I’m interested in but they don’t have a defined goal and time frame.

item.title: thanks
item.description: All lot of people have helped me throughout my life. Here’s a small tribute to them. (in no particular order)

item.title: Twift
item.description: Twift is a little tool I’m making that helps you get an engagement, followers and traffics boost through mass giveaways.
